newsitem.title: MEXICO: Banco de Mexico to auction 3.3 bln pesos of Cetes.
newsitem.headline: Banco de Mexico to auction 3.3 bln pesos of Cetes.

text.p: Banco de Mexico said it would auction 3.3 billion pesos worth of Cetes at the primary auction on Monday.
The auction be held on Monday instead of the normal Tuesday because of the observance of Constitution Day on Wednesday.
The central bank said it will also offer 900 million pesos worth of 728-day Bondes and 500 million UDIs worth of UDI bonds.
